intro: Lepidaploa nitens, commonly known as the silverleaf daisy, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family and is characterized by its silver-gray foliage and bright yellow flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky, well-drained soils and thrives in full sun. It is often cultivated for its ornamental value due to its attractive appearance and drought tolerance. Lepidaploa nitens is also valued in traditional medicine for its potential therapeutic properties.
